summary: I wanted to add my own vampire eyes I use, inspired by the moon. [ These will replace the original vampire eyes]
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][u]About:[/u][/b][/size]
You know when the moon is yellowish/orange , well I wanted that as eyes. Sort of spin on the "Children" of the night.
Also I prefer eyes that lack pupil, I may upload a smaller version of the eyes.
[u]
[color=#ff7700]Warning : This will re-place the original vampire eyes. Do a back-up before adding these.[/color][/u]


[u][size=3]Installation:[/size][/u] Use a Mod Manager or...

Manual Installation:
Copy and paste the contents of the .ZIP into your Skyrim Data folder.[size=2][b]

Manual Uninstallation:[/b][/size]
To uninstall the mod, you sadly have to replace the eyes with another mod. I wish I knew how to make a standalone mod.



[b][u]Have issues with them not glowing?[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23375/?]Use this mod[/url]
author: MassiveMaster
